title: Furnished Bills Included Condo Midrise! Galleria Uptown Houston area
posting_body: Gorgeous Furnished Galleria Condo in Stylish Midrise located 1/2 block from famous Galleria Shopping Mall.
Includes furniture, cable, high speed internet, water.
washer/dryer included, garage, resort pool, fitness center.
Also has nice cozy terrace patio.
Condo can lease for 3.6 or 12 month lease contract.
Building has underground parking garage with 24hour guard, business center, club-room, prefer long term of 12 months lease but for shorter term can be negotiated rent rate pending on lease terms.
